articles.title: Russia defaults on LNG supplies to India - Economic Times
articles.description: While the contract provides for making up of the volumes not supplied later, the Russian firm has so far nor indicated how and when it will make up for the lost volumes.
articles.content:
Russia has defaulted on the supply of at least 5 cargoes or shiploads of LNG to India after its retaliatory sanctions hit one of the companies that supply gas to India, sources said.
India's largest… [+2963 chars]
